name: Fillerina Labo Facial Lifting Cream - Grade 3 1.7 oz
product_description: The Facial Lifting Dense Cream is not a generic cream: its density is functional to the lifting effect, and works in synergy with the other ingredients included in it, which are part of the formulation of the 16-day Facial Lifting preparation. The skin tension perceived during the application is a peculiar characteristic of the product. The Cream should be used as a maintenance product, to be applied after the 16 daily applications of the dermo-cosmetic Facial Lifting.
all_ingreds: 1,6-Alpha–Linked Maltotriose is Pullulan (Pullulan is the INCI Name), a molecule that, just after the application on the skin, forms a network at skin surface that is responsible for the immediate shrinking and recompacting effect, with subsequent immediate lifting effect. However, Pullulan can also be absorbed by the skin and reach the dermis. Its absorption and the reaching of the dermis is promoted by 3 enhancers, belonging to the Patent on Labo Skin Technology No. 711 466, namely Pentylene Glycol, Decylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol. The Absorption Test conducted by means of Franz Cells (Report E. Ex07-MS04 2016/1896 dated 28/07/2016) showed an overall absorption percentage of Pullulan, in both epidermis and dermis, equal to 70.5%. The portion of Pullulan that reaches the dermis binds to dermal collagen forming a supporting scaffold that restores tissues’ firmness and compactness for a long time. This is the “”mechanical”” effect in the medium and long term, which is added to the medium and long term effect performed by the molecules playing a dermo-cosmetic “”biological”” activity, that work synergistically on the structures of the dermis (Glycine, Proline, Alanine; Tripeptide-10 Citrulline; DMAE; 3-Aminopropane Sulfonic Acid; Acetyl Tetrapeptide-2).
